data.name: Blight
data.detailed_description:
Plot:

An eccentric scientist has opened a portal to another world — releasing countless bizarre horrors into ours. All bent on our destruction. All fleeing the all-consuming Blight. An eldritch biomaterial corruption that spreads uncontrollably.

And now it’s just up to five survivors, trapped behind enemy lines in a middle-of-nowhere town, to save whatever of their world they can.

Put on your sneakiest sneakers, grab your shotgun, and above all else… Beware the Blight.


Features:

Five playable characters, each with unique strengths and weaknesses.

Many eerie locations to sneak or fight your way through..

Hordes of otherworldly abominations.

All with a stylish 80s horror VHS aesthetic.

data.short_description: Five strangers from different backgrounds must work together to save the world in a squad based tactical action game dripping with '80s horror charm.
